item.description:
Do you have a signature dish? A favorite recipe?

Sue has thoughtfully opened her home to us for a potluck dinner on Saturday, March 24.

Please contact Sue directly about what you can bring at susieshaven@yahoo.com

Directions and address wil be given to those who confirm to attending.

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Saturday Potluck Dinner at Sue's - in Pepperell
